title: Frequency Analysis of List Elements
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `collections.defaultdict` module in Python to create a function that takes a list as an argument and returns a dictionary with the unique values of the list as keys and their frequencies as the values.

meta.title: Python Function | Value Frequencies | Data Analysis | Lab
meta.description: Learn how to create a Python function that calculates the frequencies of unique values in a list, a useful tool for data analysis and various applications.
meta.keywords: Python, Function, Value Frequencies, Data Analysis, Unique Values, Frequencies
